div.p:
Curia gilde tenta per prepositum Johannem de fife et decanum gilde andream
de Culane vltimo die mensis Septembris Anno Domini et cetera xljmo

Quo die laurencius thomson' Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et
confratrem gilde huius burgi prestito solito Juramento / Et dabit pro
iij li' vj s' viij d' libertate sua iij li' vj s' viij d' plegio pro eo

Eodem die Willelmus filius Johannis lowson' Receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi Racione libertatis paterne
v s' prestito solito Juramento Et dabit pro libertate sua v s' plegio

Curia Gilde tenta in pretorio burgi de Aberdene per Joh Matheum
fichet prepositum d sexto die mensis octobris videlicet die veneris proxima
post festum beati michaelis Archangeli Anno Domini et cetera l xljmo

Quo die subscripte persone electe fuerunt in communes consiliarios dicti
burgi anni instantis
Alexander de Camera
Johannes vaus
Johannes de fife
gilbertus meignes
Johannes scrogs pater
Ricardus Ruthirfurd'
Simon blabre
Johannes de marr' Junior
Willelmus scherar'
Johannes henrison'
Andreas culane
Johannes voket pater
Stephanus Johnson'
Andreas ayncroft
Andreas branche
Thomas blyndseil
Robertus blyndseil
patricius badenach'
Johannes gray
Johannes voket filius
Willelmus spaigne
Johannes henrison' culane
Thomas Rolland'
Johannes Wood
Thomas Kymedy'

Eodem die Johannes de fife et stephanus Johnson' et Johannes gray electi
fuerunt in magistros fabrice et conseruatores bonorum ecclesie parochialis beati nycholai
huius burgi et cetera

Alsua John' of marr' and androw ayncroft arr' ordanit keparis and gaderaris
of the profite that may cum of the schippes that cum to cummys to the toune
that is to say the fraght of sek and tun / to the kirk werk

Item the counsaile has ordanit that na man be made brothir' of the gild
within ten pundez to the commoune vs' out tane prentice
that has duelt Ithandly in the burgh' or thai that
nyghboris dochter the quhilkis sal be modifijt be

Item it is ordanyt that na man freman or othir' by and forisstal woll in the
cuntreth' vndir the payne of v markis vnforgivin / and give he forisstallis
mar' than a sek he sal pay for ilke sek v markis / Item quha that forisstallis
byand skynnys he sal pay ij markis . And quha that forisstallis hidez
in the cuntreth' salpay xx s' vnforgifin

taxatus per consilium xl s'
Memorandum quod decimo die octobris Anno supradicto Johannes Duncaneson' de banf
conuictus fuit per confessionem propriam de foristallacione lane et pellium et inuenit
v li' gilbertum meignes plegio pro v li' pro pena huiusmodi forisstallacione et quod ammodo
non forisstallabit sub pena xx li'
Curia gilde tenta per Jo Matheum fichet prepositum xxmo die mensis predicti et cetera

taxatus xl s' Quo die Walterus murison' conuictus fuit per assisam de forisstallacione lane
pellium et corriorum plegio pro pena Johanne stephinson' et quod non forisstallabit ammodi
sub pena xx li'

taxatus x s' Eodem die Andreas makyson' conuictus fuit per assisam de forisstallacione lane
pellium et corriorum ac Regratacione denariatorum plegio pro pena Johannem henrison'
de culane / et quod ammodo non forisstallabit sub pena xx li'

Johannes huntar Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi solummodo Racione libertatis
v s' paterne prestito solito Juramento Et dedit pro libertate sua v s' plegio
Curia gilde tenta in pretorio per prepositum xx die mensis octobris Anno Domini et cetera xljmo
Quo die Johannes atkynson' accusatus de communi forisstallacione quitus fuit per assisam .

taxatus x s' Item Johannes adamson' de ardchery conuictus fuit per assisam de forisstallacione pellium
plegio pro eo andrea de benyne et Waltero curtyar'

Item eodem die Johannes nesbit conuictus fuit de communi forisstallacione lane pellium
et corriorum plegio pro eo
Curia gilde tenta per prepositum in pretorio tercia die mensis Nouembris anno et cetera xljmo

Quo die Willelmus maliceson' accusatus fuit de communi forisstallacione lane pellium
et corriorum et quitus per assisam
Curia gilde tenta per matheum fichet prepositum xviij die eiusdem mensis et anno supradicto

Quo die thomas club sutor posuit se in voluntate prepositj de forisstallacione
correorum et tannacione eorundem plegio
Willelmus poyntar' conuictus fuit per assisam de foristallacione pellium plegio

Memorandum quod antepenultimo die mensis Nouembris anno supradicto Consilium huis huius burgi
decreuit quod macolmus filius Willelmi gaudeat terra placitabili inter ipsum et thomam
de marr' secundum tenorem et effectum instrumentj quod inde habet dictus thomas
Et quod dicta terra appreciabitur dicto macolmo ita quod non deteriorabitur in futuro
Et pro hoc dabit securitatem sufficientem / Et si reperiatur quod dicta terra deficiat
in defectu dicti macolmi prepositus et consilium reperabunt dictam terram secundum visum
eorum cum firmis eiusdem / Et in continente dictus macolmus dedit Willelmum
matheuson' plegium quod dicta terra non deteriorabitur ut supra

Item eodem die Johannes de fife thomas Kymmedy Johannes vaus Walterus de
Dunbrek Willelmus scherar Duncanus de clat and Simon blabre arbitri electi
et Jurati in causa mota inter Jeog Jeorgium de murrefe procuratorem et attornatum'um' overwrites 'us'.
mariote vnius filiarum quondam ade de Kennardy ex vna et Willelmum de
Cowtis generum dicti mariote et partibus ex altera exstetit terminatum quod
quondam adam prefatus Resignauit terram Jacentem infra dictum burgum in
ly grene inter terram tres vias regias ex partibus australi occidentali et boreali
et terram heredum quondam Willelmi de stradee ex parte orientali in manibus balliui
ad dandum saisinam hereditariam w dicto Willelmo de cowtis de dicta terra cum
pertinenciis et quod dictus balliuus dedit sibi huiusmodi possessionem et saisinam dicto Willelmo
de dicta terra cum pertinenciis
Curia gilde tenta xvj die mensis Decembris

Quo die Johannes valandy conuictus fuit per assisam de forisstallacione
pellium in partibus ij s'
Item Johannes Smal eodem modo conuictus fuit de forisstallacione ij s'
Item Johannes de Irwyne eodem modo conuictus fuit de forisstallacione ij s'
Item Johannes robertson' eodem modo conuictus fuit de forisstallacione ij s'
Andreas bell similiter conuictus fuit de forisstallacione ij s'
Item Donaldus skynnar' similiter conuictus fuit de forisstallacione et cetera ij s'
Item John' tod similiter conuictus fuit de forisstallacione ij s'
Item Johannes lammynton' similiter conuictus fuit de forisstallacione et cetera ij s'

It is ordanit be the alderman and the commoune counsaile in the tyme of the
settyng of the wattires to termez for the payment to be made to the lord of
gordoune of ijC xx li' the quhilkis the toune is awand til him / that quhat
euir he bee that is awand ony wattir male to the toune of termez bigane
sal pay that maalez bigane or euir thar' be made ony new settyng til
him / or quhat tyme that he haldis his male fra the a terme til ane
othir' terme / vnpayit his wattir sal vake and it salbe leiful to the
aldirman and the counsaile to dispone thar'apon as thai think spedful
noght agaynstandyng the grissome that he has paijt of before et cetera
as is contenit in a statute made tharapon lang tyme syne .

Item the xxj day of Nouembre' the yer' of grace Im CCCC xlj the forsaid aldirman
and counsaile ordanit and decretit for the forsaid payment to be made
that thaa persones to the quhilkis the commoune counsaile has sett or sal
sett the wattirez of this burgh' sal pay a part of thair' grissomez of the said
wattirez eftir the tax made tharapon be the xx day of yhule next
to cum and quha sa failyeis it salbe leiful to the aldirman to sett thair'
wattirez as him think spedeful And thai sal pay the tothir part
of the grissomez be sancte John' the baptistis day next to cum
failyeis thair wattirez sal be sett be the aldirman as is
agaynstandand that thai haue paijt the firste grissomez
tyne that grissome paijt et cetera

Item thir' personez vnderwrittin warr' chosin be the ha
to see quhat wattirez vakit be Resoune and to
thocht maste speidful and to the worthiaste per
John' of fife John' the vaus John' of
John' voket pater John Gilbert meignes
Androw ayncroft

Item for the commoune profit of this toune it was ordanit and decretit the
viij day of februar' the yer' forsaid be the aldirmane matheou fichet and
the hale commoune counsaile that myght be gottyn present in the toune that
fra hyne forth'ward na gentil men of the cuntreth' sal have wattirez
or takis of this toune suppose thai cum to duel within the burgh'

Item that nane othir' merchandman or y nyghbor' of this toune that
duellis without the burgh' sal haue ony wattirez or takis of this
toune / bot give thai cum and duell within the burgh' continualy et cetera

Item anence Alexander of chamer the quhilkis has now and Joys' baath' his
fadris wattirez and his awne / the said counsale will that he haue
alsmykil wattir as ony othir' nyghbor' of the toune and quhar' be
plesand to him / bot thai will that he haue nomar than othir' nyghboris

div.head: presentes in consilio supradicto
div.p:
Johannes vaus gilbertus meignes Johannes de fife Ricardus de Ruthirfurd' Johannes
de scrogs pater Johannes de marr' Junior Andreas culane Andreas ayncroft
Johannes voket pater Willelmus scherar' John' of Culane / alexander of Kintor
Robert blyndseil Johannes voket filius thomas rolland Johannes henrison
culane / patricius de badenach' Johannes de scrogs filius thomas blyndeseil
Johannes gray Duncanus de clat

Curia gilde tenta per matheum fichet prepositum ix die mensis marcij Anno
Domini millesimo quadringentesimo xljmo

Quo die Andreas childe calumpniatus fuit de communi forisstallacione
lane pellium et corriorum / qui super hoc sumb submisit se ordinacione et
decreto communis consilij

Item Walterus murison' obligatur ad presentandum preposito hodie ad quindenam
famulos suos sub pena amerciamentj

Item iniungitur thome Rolland ad intrandum Johannem rolland famulum suum
hodie ad quindenam sub pena supradicta

Dauid blabre Thomas traile Willelmus aliceson' thomas nycholson
quilibet eorum in amerciamento quia premoniti non comparuerunt et cetera

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta per matheum fichet prepositum eiusdem
xxvijmo die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera xlijo
Quo die

The sammyn day for the gouernance of merchandice it was statute and ordanit
be the brethir' of gilde that naman by woll derar' than vj s' viij d' the
stane and give ony man beis taynt byand woll derrar' in contrair'
of this statue he sal pay to the commoune profite of this ton' but
Remissioune for ilke tyme he beis taynt xl s'

Item that naman by woll skynnys derar' than x d' schorlyngez vj d'
scaldynez iij d' / the dusane of lentrinwar' viij d' / the dusane of
futfellez ij s' /. /And quhasa dois in the contrair' sal euery tyme
that he trespass' sal pay but Remissioune vj s' viij d' / to the commoune
werk and profite of this toune //

Item the sammyn day matheu fichet aldirman become dettour' til John'
of fife of four' pundez fourtene schillingez for reddyng of the balyeis
of the yer' bipast . With ordinance and consent of the counsaile .
Curia gilde tenta per prepositum iiijto die mensis Junij Anno Domini et cetera xlijo

Quo die Walterus murison' per confessionem propriam fuit in amerciamento pro infrictione
precij pellium
Item Jacobus blyndseil conuictus fuit per assisam de infrictione precij pellium
Rogerus gillespy conuictus fuit per assisam de infrictione precij lane

Memorandum quod xxiijo die mensis Junij Anno supradicto Willelmus birde per confessionem
propriam conuictus fuit de forisstallacione pellium de et inuenit plegium Robertum
blyndseil ple tam pro pena / quam quod non forisstallabit decetero sub pena xx li'

It is to mene apon that the fift day of the moneth' of Julij the yer'
forsaid / Dauid hardgat / Dauid Dun Robert mason' and gilbert
mason' oblist thaim ane as all and all as ane / til a no honorable
knyght ser Williame of lesly of balchane / that thai sall fulfill
and perfornyce his said werk eftir the tenour' of the endentouris
made thar'apon betuex the said ser Williame / and Dauid hardgat
forsaid
